1. City Council

City Council
============

* 2nd and 4th Tuesday of every month

* Cockrell Hill City Hall
  4125 W. Clarendon Drive
  Cockrell Hill, Texas 75211

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/DocumentCenter/Index/69)

![2024 May City Council Image](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=2066)
Left to right: Â Mayor Luis D. Carrera; Council member Miriam Rodriguez, Place 1; Council member Alejandra Arriaga, Place 3; Council member Anna Zayas Rodriguez, Place 3, Council member Robert Arredondo, Place 4; and City Manager Bret Haney. Not pictured Rene Hudson Franklin, Place 2.

* [Luis D. Carrera](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/Directory.aspx?DID=21)
  , Mayor
  Term expires: May 2026
* [Miriam Rodriguez](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/Directory.aspx?DID=21)
  , Place 1
  Term expires: May 2026
* [Rene Hudson](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/Directory.aspx?EID=19)
  Franklin, Place 2
  Term expires: May 2026
* [Alejandra Arriaga](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/directory.aspx?EID=49)
  , Place 3
  Term expires: May 2025
* [Robert Arredondo](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/directory.aspx?EID=41)
  , Place 4
  Term expires: May 2025
* [Anna Zayas Rodriguez](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/directory.aspx?EID=50)
  , Place 5
  Term expires: May 2025

The City Council meets the 2nd and 4th Tuesday of every month at Cockrell Hill City Hall, 4125 W. Clarendon Drive. Meetings start at 6:30 p.m. Members of the public are welcome to attend all meetings and comment on items being considered by the Council.

For more information on the Cockrell Hill City Council, City Council Meetings, or general information about Cockrell Hill
[email the City Council](mailto:info@cockrell-hill.tx.us)
.
